Discount Amount for Frying Pan = $20*(20/100) = $4.00 .. thus Post Sale Total = ($20-$4)=$16     
Discount Amount for Towels = $30*(10/100)=$3.00 ... hence post Sale Total=$30-(3)$=$$27      
So Subtotal(Pre Tax) = $$($16+$27)=
